info.title: GeoDB Cities API
info.description:
The GeoDB API focuses on getting global city and region data. Easily obtain country, region, and city data for use in your apps!
  • Filter cities by name prefix, country, location, time-zone, and even minimum population.
  • Sort cities by name, country code, elevation, and population - or any combination of these.
  • Get all country regions.
  • Get all cities in a given region.
  • Display results in multiple languages.
  • RESTful API adheres to industry best-practices, including HATEOAS-style links to facilitate paging results.
  • Backed by cloud-based load-balanced infrastructure for resiliency and performance!
  • Data is periodically refreshed from GeoNames and WikiData.

Notes:

  • Since the database is periodically updated, this may very rarely result in certain cities being marked deleted (e.g., duplicates removed). By default, endpoints returning city data will exclude cities marked deleted. However, in the unlikely event that this occurs while your app is paging through a set of affected results - and you care about the paged results suddenly changing underneath - specify includeDeleted=SINCE_YESTERDAY (or SINCE_LAST_WEEK if you're really paranoid!).

Useful Resources

  • SDKs
    • Angular, Sample App
    • Java
    • JavaScript
  • Swagger Docs
  • Usage License

get.description:
Find administrative divisions, filtering by optional criteria. If no criteria are set, you will get back all
known divisions.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Only places near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: The location radius within which to find places

parameters.name: distanceUnit
parameters.description: The unit of distance: MI | KM

parameters.name: countryIds
parameters.description: Only places in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

parameters.name: excludedCountryIds
parameters.description: Only places NOT in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

parameters.name: minPopulation
parameters.description: Only places having at least this population

parameters.name: maxPopulation
parameters.description: Only places having no more than this population

parameters.name: namePrefix
parameters.description:
Only entities whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name
as it appears in that language.

parameters.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
parameters.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default languageCode is set.

parameters.name: timeZoneIds
parameters.description: Only places in these time-zones (comma-delimited)

parameters.name: asciiMode
parameters.description: Display results using ASCII characters

parameters.name: hateoasMode
parameters.description: Include HATEOAS-style links in results

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Display results in this language

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
How to sort places. 
Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD 
where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Whether to include any divisions marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE

get.description:
Get the details for a specific administrative division, including location coordinates, population, and
elevation above sea-level (if available).

parameters.name: divisionId
parameters.description: An admin-division id (either native 'id' or 'wikiDataId')

parameters.name: asciiMode
parameters.description: Display results using ASCII characters

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Display results in this language

get.description:

get.description:
Get all regions in a specific country. These could be states, provinces, districts, or otherwise major
political divisions.

parameters.name: countryId
parameters.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id

parameters.name: namePrefix
parameters.description:
Only entities whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name
as it appears in that language.

parameters.name: namePrefixDefaultLangResults
parameters.description: When name-prefix matching, whether or not to match on names in the default language if a non-default languageCode is set.

parameters.name: asciiMode
parameters.description: Display results using ASCII characters

parameters.name: hateoasMode
parameters.description: Include HATEOAS-style links in results

parameters.name: languageCode
parameters.description: Display results in this language

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
How to sort regions. 
Format: ±SORT_FIELD 
where SORT_FIELD = fipsCode | isoCode | name

BaseCollectionResponse.title: Base Collection Response
BaseCollectionResponse.description: Common properties for all collection  responses

currencyCodes.description: A list of supported ISO-4217 currency codes

numRegions.description: The number of regions in this country

currencyCodes.description: A list of supported ISO-4217 currency codes

countryCodes.description: A list of ISO-3166 country codes of countries supporting this currency

data.description: The date-time in ISO-6801 format: yyyyMMdd'T'HHmmssZ

DistanceResponse.title: Distance Response
DistanceResponse.description: A decimal distance (in miles or kilometers)

data.description: The distance in units as set by the distanceUnit param (defaults to miles)

Error.title: Error
Error.description: An error that occurred processing the request

ErrorCode.title: ErrorCode
ErrorCode.description:
One of a set of enumerated error codes representing the types of errors that can occur processing a
request

LanguageDescriptor.title: Language
LanguageDescriptor.description: A language supported by the service

LanguagesResponse.title: Languages Response
LanguagesResponse.description: A list of languages supported by the system

Locale.title: Locale
Locale.description: A locale representing a language/region combination

Metadata.title: Metadata

currentOffset.description: The zero-ary offset into the results (0 is the first result)

totalCount.description: The total number of results across pages

Metadata.description: Result metadata (currently only associated with collection results)

deleted.description: If this place has been soft-deleted

elevationMeters.description: The place elevation (meters) above sea level

regionCode.description: The ISO or FIPS region code

distance.description: Included if this is the result of a distance query

regionCode.description: The ISO or FIPS region code

PopulatedPlaceType.description:
One of a set of enumerated populated-place types known by the service (currently only level-2 admin divisions and
cities)

capital.description: The region's capital city (varies by languageCode)

numCities.description: The number of cities in this region

data.description: The time in ISO-8601 format: HHmmss.SSSZ

rawUtcOffsetHours.description: The number of hours this time-zone is offset from UTC
The number of hours this time-zone is offset from UTC

Distance.description: A decimal distance (in miles or kilometers)

Languages.description: A list of languages supported by the system

path.countryId.name: countryId
path.countryId.description: An ISO-3166 country code or WikiData id

path.regionCode.name: regionCode
path.regionCode.description: An ISO-3166 or FIPS region code

How to sort countries. 
Format: ±SORT_FIELD 
where SORT_FIELD = code | name

Only entities whose names start with this prefix. If languageCode is set, the prefix will be matched on the name
as it appears in that language.

query.includeDeleted.description: Whether to include any divisions marked deleted: ALL | SINCE_YESTERDAY | SINCE_LAST_WEEK | NONE

query.limit.description: The maximum number of results to retrieve

query.offset.name: offset
query.offset.description: The zero-ary offset index into the results

query.place.countryIds.description: Only places in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

query.place.excludedCountryIds.name: excludedCountryIds
query.place.excludedCountryIds.description: Only places NOT in these countries (comma-delimited country codes or WikiData ids)

query.place.location.id.name: location
query.place.location.id.description: Only places near this location. Latitude/longitude in ISO-6709 format: ±DD.DDDD±DDD.DDDD

query.place.location.radiusOf.name: radius
query.place.location.radiusOf.description: The location radius within which to find places

query.place.maxPopulation.name: maxPopulation
query.place.maxPopulation.description: Only places having no more than this population

query.place.minPopulation.name: minPopulation
query.place.minPopulation.description: Only places having at least this population

query.place.sort.name: sort
query.place.sort.description:
How to sort places. 
Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD 
where SORT_FIELD = countryCode | elevation | name | population

query.place.sort.withinRegion.name: sort
query.place.sort.withinRegion.description:
How to sort place results. 
'Format: ±SORT_FIELD,±SORT_FIELD' 
where SORT_FIELD = elevation | name | population

query.place.types.name: types
query.place.types.description: Only places for these types (comma-delimited): CITY | ADM2

query.region.sort.name: sort
query.region.sort.description:
How to sort regions. 
Format: ±SORT_FIELD 
where SORT_FIELD = fipsCode | isoCode | name
